ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( OR( (ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status__c ), "Enquiry") && ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Reserved") ), (ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status__c ), "Expired") && ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Reserved") ), (ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status__c ), "Reserved") && ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Expired") ), (ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status__c ), "Reserved") && ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Confirmed") ), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Cancelled"), (ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status__c ), "Cancelled") && ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Enquiry") ), (ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status__c ), "Reserved") && ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Confirmed") ), (ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status__c ), "Enquiry") && ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Cancelled") ), (ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status__c ), "Reserved") && ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Cancelled") ), (ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status__c ), "Confirmed") && ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Cancelled") ) ) ), ISCHANGED(Status__c ), OR(NOT($Permission.Override_Booking_Validation), NOT($Permission.Override_Booking_Validation)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Inappropriate status transition. (Possible options: Enquiry - Reserved; Expired - Reserved; Cancelled - Enquiry; Enquiry, Reserved, Confirmed - Cancelled).
